attributes.action: Withdraw all British troops from Iraq and hand complete control of Basra to the Iraqi police and armed forces and double the amount of troops in Afghanistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Also, at least double the national defence budget increaseing Army pay, giving more equipment to protect the average infantry soilder, dramitcily increase the standards  of army accommidition in the UK and exempt the wives and Husbands of servicemen and women from tax.
